title: “Category B” has the same meaning as it has in Regulation 6 of the Regulations
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Road Traffic (Recognition of Foreign
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Road Traffic (Recognition of Foreign 

Driving Licences) (Ukraine) Order 2022.
text_norm: 1 order may cited road traffic (recognition foreign driving licences) (ukraine) order 2022

title: “Category B” has the same meaning as it has in Regulation 6 of the Regulations
heading: In this Order –
text_raw:
2. 

In this Order – 

“Category B” has the same meaning as it has in Regulation 6 of the Regulations 
of 2006; 

“Regulations of 2006” means the Road Traffic (Licensing of Drivers) 
Regulations 2006 (S.I. No. 537 of 2006).
text_norm: 2 order - category b meaning regulation 6 regulation 2006 regulation 2006 mean road traffic (licensing drivers) regulation 2006 (s.i no 537 2006)

title: “Category B” has the same meaning as it has in Regulation 6 of the Regulations
heading: It is declared that a licence or permit permitting a person, to whom
text_raw:
3. 

It is declared that a licence or permit permitting a person, to whom 
section 60 of the International Protection Act 2015 (No. 66 of 2015) applies, to 
drive a mechanically propelled vehicle, not being a licence or permit issued to 
the person to enable that person to learn or provisionally to drive such a vehicle, 
issued by the competent authority of Ukraine in a category which corresponds 
to category B in the Table to Regulation 6 of the Regulations of 2006, is 
recognised for the purpose of exchange of that licence or permit for a driving 
licence.
text_norm: 3 declared licence permit permitting person section 60 international protection act 2015 (no 66 2015) applies drive mechanically propelled vehicle licence permit issued person enable person learn provisionally drive vehicle issued competent authority ukraine category corresponds category b table regulation 6 regulation 2006 recognised purpose exchange licence permit driving licence

title: “Category B” has the same meaning as it has in Regulation 6 of the Regulations
heading: 4. Notwithstanding Regulation 10(2) of the Regulations of 2006, a driving
text_raw:
4. Notwithstanding Regulation 10(2) of the Regulations of 2006, a driving 
licence granted in exchange for a licence or permit specified in Article 3 shall be 
so granted for a period of 12 months beginning on the day on which the licence 
is granted.
text_norm: 4 notwithstanding regulation 10(2) regulation 2006 driving licence granted exchange licence permit specified article 3 shall granted period 12 month beginning day licence granted

title: “Category B” has the same meaning as it has in Regulation 6 of the Regulations
heading: 5. Regulation 41(8) of the Regulations of 2006 does not apply to the
text_raw:
5. Regulation 41(8) of the Regulations of 2006 does not apply to the 

exchange of a licence or permit specified in Article 3. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 26th April, 2022. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [192] 3 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

22 April, 2022. 

EAMON RYAN, 

Minister for Transport. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [192]

title: “Category B” has the same meaning as it has in Regulation 6 of the Regulations
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

This Order provides for a driving licence issued by the licensing authority of 
Ukraine to be exchanged for an Irish driving licence to drive a car (category B 
only) for a period of 12 months. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 [192] 5
